title: Donald Trump at odds with Google, accuses tech giant of posting 'bad stories' about him
description: Former U.S. President Donald Trump has accused Google of bias, claiming the search engine posts negative stories about him while favoring his Democratic rival Kamala Harris. Trump has threatened prosecution if he wins the upcoming presidential election, citing alleged election interference by Google. Google denies these claims, asserting its algorithms are impartial.
content: Former US President Donald Trump has targeted Google, accusing the search engine of posting "bad stories" about him and affirming prosecution if he wins the presidential election on November 5. Trump claimed that Google only displays only positive articles about his Democratic rival Vice President Kamala Harris.
cleaned_content: former us president donald trump has targeted google accusing the search engine of posting bad stories about him and affirming prosecution if he wins the presidential election on november <FIVE_> trump claimed that google only displays only positive articles about his democratic rival vice president kamala harris
